## FASTElement variable

A minimal base class for FASTElements that also provides static helpers for working with FASTElements.

**Signature:**

```typescript
FASTElement: {
    new (): FASTElement;
    define: typeof define;
    compose: typeof compose;
    defineAsync: typeof defineAsync;
    from: typeof from;
}
```
